name: Aozora Meikyuu
description:
After a failed love confession, Aoi Takamatsu dropped out of school and became a shut-in. It was one of these rare days where he left his home to go shopping.
Blinded by the sun on this warm summer day he looked up to the sky and saw a naked girl falling from the sky?!
This was the moment his boring life changed forever...

Features
-Different endings, depending on your choices
-Original Anime Art and Soundtrack
-Available for Windows, Mac and Linux

Get an exclusive digital dakimakura, only available on steam!
